wikitext.*: Hetalia: Axis Powers(Japanese: Axis Powers ヘタリア) is a Japanese [[webcomic]] created by [[Hikedaz Himaruya]], and later also adapted as [[manga]] and [[anime series]]. It is about [[moe anthropomorphism]] of the countries around the world, mainly about [[Italy|Veneziano Vargas]]. Non-country territory (e.g. Hong Kong) and micronations (e.g. Sealand) are also included.  All characters show both the positive and the negative sides of the cultural streotypes they represent.
